Features.title: No need to carry a POS or card reader
Features.text:
Accept payments through your existing smartphone. 

100% convenience.

Features.title: Offer multiple payment options to your customers
Features.text:
Your customers can pay through their preferred payment medium like Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal, Bank transfer or cards. 

 Customers pay from the safety of their own smartphone.

Features.title: Your customers do not have to download any mobile app
Features.text:
All your customers need is a smartphone.
 They have to scan the QR, and pay. That's it!

Features.title: 100% secure payments. Powered by Iyzico
Features.text:
World-class security is engineered in PesaPay software from the ground up.

 We are powered by iyzico and we do not access your customer's card information.
